name: Soul Link
description: Link a player's soul to you, now you are able to control and see their soul from afar.

badges.text: Link/Unlink the closest soul within 5 blocks with %s

conditions.command: execute at @p[distance=0.1..5] unless score @p soulLinkID = @s soulLinkID

action.command: title @s actionbar {"text":"⚠ Cannot soul weave another Soul Weaver","color":"#c75959","bold":true}

conditions.command: execute at @p[distance=0.1..5] unless score @p soulLinkID = @s soulLinkID
execute at @p[distance=0.1..5] unless score @p soulLinkID = @s soulLinkID

action.command: title @s actionbar {"text":"⚠ That player is already linked to another Soul Weaver.","color":"#c75959","bold":true}

conditions.command: execute at @p[distance=0.1..5] if score @p soulLinkID = @s soulLinkID
